action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes physical machines as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete physical machines
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -ex

if [ ! -d "deployments" ]
then
    mkdir deployments
fi

echo 'apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: mongo
  labels:
    name: mongo
spec:
  ports:
    - port: 27017
      targetPort: 27017
  clusterIP: None
  selector:
    role: mongo' | tee deployments/mongodb_headless_service.yaml
   
   
echo 'apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
 name: mongo
spec:
 serviceName: "mongo"
 replicas: 3
 template:
   metadata:
     labels:
       role: mongo
       environment: test
   spec:
     terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
     containers:
       - name: mongo
         image: mongo
         command:
           - mongod
           - "--replSet"
           - rs0
           - "--smallfiles"
           - "--noprealloc"
           - "--bind_ip_all"
         ports:
           - containerPort: 27017
         volumeMounts:
           - name: mongo-persistent-storage
             mountPath: /data/db
       - name: mongo-sidecar
         image: cvallance/mongo-k8s-sidecar
         env:
           - name: MONGO_SIDECAR_POD_LABELS
             value: "role=mongo,environment=test"
 volumeClaimTemplates:
 - metadata:
     name: mongo-persistent-storage
   spec:
     storageClassName: silver
     accessModes: [ "ReadWriteOnce" ]
     resources:
       requests:
         storage: 50Gi' | tee deployments/mongodb_stateless.yaml

#!/bin/bash -ex

kubectl exec -it mongo-0 -- mongo --eval 'rs.initiate({_id: "rs0", version: 1, members: [{ _id: 0, host: "mongo-0.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017", priority: 100},{ _id: 1, host: "mongo-1.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017"},{ _id: 2, host: "mongo-2.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017"}]})'
kubectl exec -it mongo-0 -- mongo --eval 'rs.status()'
sleep 5

#!/bin/bash -ex

kubectl exec -it mongo-0 -- mongo -- demodb < peakJson.js

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes physical machines as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete physical machines
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -ex

if [ ! -d "deployments" ]
then
    mkdir deployments
fi

echo 'apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: nodejs-mongo-ha-app-svc
  labels:
    app: nodejs-mongo-ha-app
spec:
  type: NodePort
  ports:
  - port: 3000
    nodePort: 30001
    protocol: TCP
  selector:
    app: nodejs-mongo-ha-app' | tee deployments/nodejs_service.yaml
   
   
echo 'apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nodejs-mongo-ha-app-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 2
  minReadySeconds: 10
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
      maxSurge: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nodejs-mongo-ha-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nodejs-mongo-ha-app-pod
        image: nodejs-mongo-ha-app:0.1.0
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000' | tee deployments/nodejs_app_deployment.yaml

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes physical machines as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete physical machines
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -ex

if [ ! -d "deployments" ]
then
    mkdir deployments
fi

echo 'apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: calmdemo-web-svc
  labels:
    app: calmdemo-nginx-web
spec:
  type: NodePort
  ports:
  - port: 80
    nodePort: 30002
    protocol: TCP
  selector:
    app: calmdemo-nginx-web' | tee deployments/nginx_service.yaml
   
   
echo 'apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: calmdemo-nginx-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 2
  minReadySeconds: 10
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
      maxSurge: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: calmdemo-nginx-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: calmdemo-nginx-pod
        image: calmdemo-nginx-web:0.1.2
        env:
        - name: NODEJS_IP_ADDRESS
          value: "@@{minion_node}@@"
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080' | tee deployments/nginx_web_deployment.yaml

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -ex

if [ ! -d "deployments" ]
then
    mkdir deployments
fi

echo 'apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: mongo
  labels:
    name: mongo
spec:
  ports:
    - port: 27017
      targetPort: 27017
  clusterIP: None
  selector:
    role: mongo' | tee deployments/mongodb_headless_service.yaml
   
   
echo 'apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
 name: mongo
spec:
 serviceName: "mongo"
 replicas: 3
 template:
   metadata:
     labels:
       role: mongo
       environment: test
   spec:
     terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
     containers:
       - name: mongo
         image: mongo
         command:
           - mongod
           - "--replSet"
           - rs0
           - "--smallfiles"
           - "--noprealloc"
           - "--bind_ip_all"
         ports:
           - containerPort: 27017
         volumeMounts:
           - name: mongo-persistent-storage
             mountPath: /data/db
       - name: mongo-sidecar
         image: cvallance/mongo-k8s-sidecar
         env:
           - name: MONGO_SIDECAR_POD_LABELS
             value: "role=mongo,environment=test"
 volumeClaimTemplates:
 - metadata:
     name: mongo-persistent-storage
   spec:
     storageClassName: silver
     accessModes: [ "ReadWriteOnce" ]
     resources:
       requests:
         storage: 50Gi' | tee deployments/mongodb_stateless.yaml

#!/bin/bash -ex

kubectl exec -it mongo-0 -- mongo --eval 'rs.initiate({_id: "rs0", version: 1, members: [{ _id: 0, host: "mongo-0.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017", priority: 100},{ _id: 1, host: "mongo-1.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017"},{ _id: 2, host: "mongo-2.mongo.default.svc.cluster.local:27017"}]})'
kubectl exec -it mongo-0 -- mongo --eval 'rs.status()'
sleep 5

#!/bin/bash -ex

kubectl exec -it mongo-0 -- mongo -- demodb < peakJson.js

if [ ! -d "deployments" ]

echo 'apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: calmdemo-web-svc
  labels:
    app: calmdemo-nginx-web
spec:
  type: NodePort
  ports:
  - port: 80
    nodePort: 30002
    protocol: TCP
  selector:
    app: calmdemo-nginx-web' | tee deployments/nginx_service.yaml
   
   
echo 'apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: calmdemo-nginx-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 2
  minReadySeconds: 10
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
      maxSurge: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: calmdemo-nginx-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: calmdemo-nginx-pod
        image: calmdemo-nginx-web:0.1.2
        env:
        - name: NODEJS_IP_ADDRESS
          value: "@@{minion_node}@@"
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080' | tee deployments/nginx_web_deployment.yaml
